video.title: Noragami
video.synopsis: Though he's a deity, nobody really worships Yato. But after he teams with a young girl, the pair sets out to bring him the recognition he craves.

episodes.synopsis: Killed while saving a stranger from being hit by a bus, schoolgirl Hiyori falls into a limbo, where she learns that the stranger is the god Yato.
episodes.title: A Housecat, a Stray God, and a Tail

episodes.synopsis: Yato still needs his own regalia, but when Hiyori tries to convert a phantom for him, she ends up inflaming it to the point of violence.
episodes.title: Snow-like

episodes.synopsis: Yukine (now Yato's regalia), Yato and Hiyori are summoned before Lord Tenjin, who sends them to deal with phantoms and save a young boy.
episodes.title: Bidden Calamity

episodes.synopsis: Yato is summoned to help a suicidal office worker whose tragic story is overshadowed by the freak accident that occurs when Yato arrives.
episodes.title: Where Happiness Lies

episodes.synopsis: Yato teaches Yukine a new technique for battling phantoms just as they encounter the spirit of a little girl possessed by them.
episodes.title: Borderline

episodes.synopsis: When the vengeful god Bishamon targets Yato, Hiyori summons Kofuku and Daikoku to help, but their assistance proves disastrous.
episodes.title: Scary Person

episodes.synopsis: Kazuma learns of Hiyori's spirit identity, and a phantom attack gives Yato the opportunity to reassure Yukine of his role as a regalia.
episodes.title: Uncertainty & Destiny

episodes.synopsis: Yato and Yukine are summoned to Hiyori's school, where a phantom is forcing a bullied student to confront his attacker.
episodes.title: Over the Line

episodes.synopsis: Yato will die unless Yukine is punished for his wrongdoing, but the technique involves gathering three regalia to hear his confession.
episodes.title: Name

episodes.synopsis: Lord Tenjin presents Yato with a devastating decision, and Nora sets her phantoms on Hiyori, with shocking results.
episodes.title: Regarded with Hate

episodes.synopsis: Nora steals Hiyori's memory of Yato to become Rabo's regalia, and the dangerous truth about Rabo is revealed.
episodes.title: Abandoned God

episodes.synopsis: Yato battles Rabo for possession of a crystal that holds the last of Hiyori's stolen memories while protecting Hiyori herself from oblivion.
episodes.title: A Scrap of a Memory
